# <a name="error-550553-in-outlookcom"></a><span data-ttu-id="89699-102">Pogreška 550/553 u sustavu Outlook.com</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="89699-102">Error 550/553 in Outlook.com</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="89699-103">Kada niste kod kuæe i šaljete poruku e-pošte s povezanog računa pomoću Outlook.com, poruka e-pošte možda će se vratiti s porukom o pogrešci 550, 553 ili zabranjenom prijenosom.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="89699-103">When you're away from home and send an email from your connected account using Outlook.com, your email message might be returned with a 550, 553, or relay-prohibited error message.</span></span>

1. <span data-ttu-id="89699-104">Provjera [postavki sinkronizacije e-pošte](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2031283) pri **postavkama**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="89699-104">Check your [email sync settings](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2031283) at **Settings**</span></span> <img src='data:image/png;base64,' /> <span data-ttu-id="89699-105">> **Prikaz svih postavki**  >  programa Outlook **Pošta**  >  **Sinkronizacija e-pošte**.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="89699-105">> **View all Outlook settings** > **Mail** > **Sync email**.</span></span>
1. <span data-ttu-id="89699-106">Provjerite je li zadana adresa s adrese ista kao naziv domene e-pošte.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="89699-106">Make sure your default from address is the same as your email domain name.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="89699-107">Ako imate vlastitu domenu e-pošte, promijenite je u adresu outlook.com, live.com ili hotmail.com.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="89699-107">If you have your own email domain included, change it to your outlook.com, live.com, or hotmail.com address.</span></span>
